mapper.select: select * from chart where to_char(cdate,'yyyy') = #{year} order by cdate
select rtrim(substr(mroad,1,instr(mroad,' ',1,1))) city , count(mid) city_count from member group by substr(mroad,1,instr(mroad,' ',1,1))

select count(CASE WHEN a.age between 1 and 9 then 1 end) a0 ,count(CASE WHEN a.age between 10 and 19 then 1 end) a10 ,count(CASE WHEN a.age between 20 and 28 then 1 end) a20 ,count(CASE WHEN a.age between 30 and 39 then 1 end) a30 ,count(CASE WHEN a.age between 40 and 49 then 1 end) a40 ,count(CASE WHEN a.age >=50 then 1 end) a50 from (select trunc(months_between(sysdate,to_date(mbirth,'yyyy/mm/dd'))/12)+1 age from member) a
select anispecies, count(anispecies) cnt, anibreed from animal where anino!=0 group by anispecies, anibreed order by 1
